fixed_skill.desc: Increase party's Defense by 16.3%/17.1%/17.9%. For every 500 of the user's Defense, increase party's Defense by 2.7%/2.8%/3.0% more, up to 10.8%/11.3%/11.9%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Marakukaja

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Defense by 9.1% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Maraku II

innate_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 124.2/129.1/134.0% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 18% for foes with an elemental ailment.
innate_skill.name: Freila

innate_skill.desc: Decrease Speed by 9. Increase HP by 22%.
innate_skill.name: Ironclad Resolve II

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 11.6%. After using a skill on an ally, increase target's Defense by 11.5%. If HP is over 50%, increase Defense by 50% more. Lasts for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Sun's Protection

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 11.6%. After using a skill on an ally, increase target's Defense by 13%. If HP is over 50%, increase Defense by 50% more. Lasts for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Sun's Protection I

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 11.6%. After using a skill on an ally, increase target's Defense by 14.5%. If HP is over 50%, increase Defense by 50% more. Lasts for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Sun's Protection II

showtime_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275 for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
